target_assessment.notes: [The model completely misses the target vulnerability_type slated in the ground truth and did not find the issue in the function present in the ground_truth .]

other_findings.model_claim: deposit_for allows any address to add tokens to any existing veNFT without ownership or approval checks, increasing the target's locked amount and voting power. This bypasses permissions, enabling manipulation of voting weights in connected systems like gauges.
other_findings.reasoning: [ The deposit_for fuction works as intended by design ]
